title: can we FKING NERF THIS SHITTY CHAMPION?
body:
i really like watching my health bar gets vanshied in one sec in level 4 {{champion:121}}  <3
this champ has fking op damge and he is unable to get killed late game because riot gave him many ways to escape
E/W for slow/R for ms and invisiblity 
and Q for making adc players or even assassins player disconnect after getting 200 or even more from level 6 
yeahh this champ is insane {{champion:121}}  I really like it especailly when  he jumps on me and deletes my whole health bar <3


Hi riot

replies.body: Careful. The assassin mains might hear you and downvote this into the dirt.

> [{quoted}](name=The thigh guy,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=HtmAIFjK,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-03-19T02:37:33.453+0000)
>
> Careful. The assassin mains might hear you and downvote this into the dirt.

Yes, because Kha'Zix is balanced, with a 49% wr

> [{quoted}](name=PlsBuffMyMain,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=HtmAIFjK,comment-id=00010001,timestamp=2019-03-19T08:03:59.050+0000)
>
> Yes, because Kha'Zix is balanced, with a 49% wr

51.02% overall
im an assassin main and i felt bad for getting one shotted by him when i was playing adc ._.
minions counter zix due to isolation bonus taken away. 2nd best thing is a ally grouping up with you.

khazix is only really a problem when he is able to abuse dusk blade or black cleaver too hard, hes kind of okay right now.

If anything he is our last bastion of hope against vayne since he can go invis whenever she does lol.
